=== Ubuntu Open Week - Oct 22nd - Oct 27th, 2007 ===
Simplified Logs from the week long open community event showcasing Ubuntu held on IRC #ubuntu-classroom. Logs here have been edited to remove background traffic and have been synced. Please let AusImage know if there are errors. Full logs are <nowiki>[[http://people.ubuntu.com/~fabbione/irclogs/|here]]</nowiki>.
